diabetes_history: No diabetes. HbA1c consistently normal (most recent 5.2% in 2025). Fasting glucose 92. No family history of diabetes.

expected_issues.description: Diabetic retinopathy screening billed for non-diabetic patient
Continuous glucose monitoring setup billed for patient without diabetes
Diabetic foot exam billed for non-diabetic patient

documents.content: 38-year-old female with history of migraine headaches presents for follow-up. Migraines occur 2-3 times per month, responsive to sumatriptan. No aura, no neurological deficits. Patient reports excellent overall health. Recent labs: HbA1c 5.2%, fasting glucose 92, normal metabolic panel. No diabetes, no cardiovascular disease. Physical exam: Alert and oriented, cranial nerves II-XII intact, normal sensation and strength in all extremities. Plan: Continue sumatriptan for acute migraine treatment, consider propranolol for prophylaxis if frequency increases.

line_items.description: Fundus photography with interpretation and report
Continuous glucose monitoring of interstitial tissue fluid via subcutaneous sensor
Initial physician evaluation and management of diabetic patient with diabetic sensory neuropathy
